text: Congratulations to our 3 lucky winners! @alenainlalaland @weeqiweeqi @kiantjoe Please drop us a DM message and we'll liaise with you for prize delivery. A big thank you to all the participants! ❤️ We love all the heartwarming stories. Do stay well during this period and stay tune as we have more exciting activities coming up!
Thanks for sharing and your participation! We love them all! Stay tune and we'll announce the winners soon. Do remember to follow us! 😊
Simply cooked her favourite dish will make my mum very happy. (^. ^)

I express my grateful and love to Mom this year in double celebrations because not just this year Mother's Day falls during #CB period but also this year is Mom 60th birthday 🙂🎉🎂 So that, I celebrated it with Mom's favourite home-cooked dishes complete with ice jelly dessert and not forgetting ordered birthday cake as I can not bake 😂 with this Mother's Day message: Thank you Mom for putting our well-being before yourself. You hardly take care and pamper yourself. 
When we were children, you had to work to help Dad earning income for the family. But, you has never shown your exhaustion to us, you even remember to bring us out for nice meals on weekends or sometimes cook healthy home-cooked meals. 
Now, even brother has family on his own, you still thinking about brother's family well being. 
Currently, Dad is bedridden. you choose to take care Dad on your own without asking our help because you do not want to burden us with Dad's condition so that we can focus on our work. 
Thank you Mom for your love, care, understanding and dedication so that we always feel the warmth and happy home 
Happy Mother's Day Mom 😍🎉🎂
May you forever be happy, healthy and blessed 🙆‍♀️💖👩‍👧‍👦 Hope to be selected as one of three winners and thank you @shopavision
for this awesome giveaway chance

💐Mother’s Day comes & brings with it a variety of emotions. It is a joyful day & I shower my mum with tons of extra love 💗 & attention, always making her feel extra special on this day. I bought her a lovely bouquet of fragrant flowers 💐& her favourite food from Violet Oon restaurant.🍽
.
🌹 I am so thankful for my mum. A candle🕯can keep a room glow with its light, but a mum like her makes all my days bright!💡🌞 My mum 👩‍🦰 inspired me to dream God-sized💥 dreams, speaks truth & encouragement in difficult seasons & reminds me how I shine🌟. She has made a difference in my life greatly 😇 .
Mothers are incredible creation of God 😇. My mum spent her life pouring selflessly & sacrificially into me. When I was young 👶👧, she carried diaper bags, waterbottles, lunchboxes,🎒, books & bandages. When I grew up👩, she gracefully carry all my burdens, worries, cares & concerns! .
Being a mom is like no other job in the world & her job is never done. Unlike a typical 9-to-5 job, motherhood is a “career” often motivated by pure & unwavering 🔥love. Mum cares & nurtures me.🎋 She knows me deeply & loves me dearly, all the while instilling the importance of a love, empathy & compassion for others. She takes her role seriously, praying for me, guiding me & serving me as a beautiful reflection of God’s unfailing & unrelenting love. .
👩‍🦰 Mum, words can’t explain how I feel. I appreciate your presence & existence. Who you are is irreplaceable. You’re an awesome mother🦸‍♀️ You’re a virtuous wife 👨‍👩‍👧 You're a gift of love that fills my heart & my life. I’m so grateful for all that you poured into me. You showed me what love feels like & made me believe I could take on the world. You always saw the best in me & hoped the best for me. You were selfless over & over & over again. I wouldn’t be here without you! I would be so lost without you! Thank you from the bottom of my heart. I’m so privileged to call you, "Mom"!🌹

I buy the ingredients  from NTUC and prepare her favourite food, chicken curry and bake  her favourite  banana cake. The most difficult  task will be buying durians for her although  I  can't stand the durians smell😅 I 💖 you Mum ❤️ . Love you always😊🤗
As we are apart, I made my mum a video of collage documenting my journey as a mum as my mum as the beloved grandma!

Since it is still the circuit breaker period, my family celebrated Mother's Day with a hearty feast ordered from A-One Claypot 😊 
To the Queen of my Heart (@kimchoo3839 ):
1) Provider 
You have been a steady provider and works to see that our family has the necessities of life. You have been a loyal employee in your job for the past 35 years. Given at the age of 6️⃣0️⃣, you seldom complain about being lethargic even when you need to take care of your grandchildren  during your post-retirement stage.
2) Teacher
You always willingly share your knowledge and principles to help us grow and develop over the years. You never allow us to take things for granted and always remind us to cherish what we have at the present. From the food on the table to the good education you have paid for, you will make us appreciate the values in everything we have!
3) Friend
You naturally show kindness, compassion and interest in our family. Whenever you are 🆓, you will spare some time to listen to us and have a good chat with us. You are just like everyone's best friend in the family! 
4) Exemplar
You show by the way you live an example of what the family stands for. You will not smoke if you don't want us to do it, and likewise does not drink heavily if you do not want us to do so. You taught us to deal with conflict in our family and with others by being firm but reasonable at the same time! 
5) Patriarch
You are honoured because of your moral character and actions. You don't expect us to live the same kind of life you do, and do the same kind of work. You respected our values and opinions, as long as they don't harm the family or anyone else! 
6) Disciplinarian
You helped us learn proper boundaries and consequences. You will strongly disapprove any of our misdeeds by using tough love to prove a point. You did this through the power of your words, not your fists. Likewise, you don't reward us for actions that are expected of us, such as helping with house chores or performing well in school!
Thank you for all the selfless sacrifices 💞💞
I LOVE 💟 YOU MUM 💯💯💯 💋💋

we celebrate with lots of yummy food from the delivery team and this year my gift is a carton box from my 4 year old son.. He went to the living room get a empty box trying to find wrapping paper but none so end up he hide in the box and ask me open and he pop up and say happy mother day 😂😂😂 What a funny n  cute gift i had @xxbeexx__ @weeming0_0 @kanglaychoo
Bank transfer my mummy an angpao 😍😍 @sheanneeeeee

This year I draw and prepare a blank "Air Ticket Card" for Mama and Mama can fill in any country she would like to visit once the situation improve and we're allow to travel again and this card will be in exchange for a real Air Ticket Card once traveling resume. This will be my Mother's Day present to her. ❤️❤️ And I cook Mama favorite Fish Head Curry and Drunken Chicken, although I can't cook as well like her and burnt the curry chicken but I believe she can feel the love behind and how much I appreciate her.
My mama, she’s amazing. 💖
I will never forget the difficult period when Mama was pregnant with me and the pain when she gave birth to me. Also the hardships mama had been through during the years when my dad was fighting his liver cancer. She was the pillar of strength and source of income for the whole family. She never once complained or falter. She supported my sis and I who were then, still studying while taking care of my dad who was frail and weak. Despite having to juggle both work and house chores, she had never once complained, and stayed strong throughout. Whenever my dad felt like giving up, she’d be the one, reading all sorts of books, trying her very best to find means to cure his illness. She’d cook him nutritious meals and make fresh fruit juice everyday even though she was already so exhausted from work. And every night she will spend time to check my homework and ask my progress because she know I am not doing well in school. The encouragement she gives, the care and concern she shows, the many good times we shared, the times she pampered me and so forth. 
This is mother’s love! The little things she does everyday. Be it rain or shine, she will still do it for you unconditionally. It is of such innocence, yet it has no boundaries and limit. Mama will always be there! 
Thankful for mama always being there for me! Now whenever I am in trouble, I will always ask my heart - “What should I do?” Every single time it replies: “Do what your mother would tell you to do” My mama will always be the guiding light in my life! 🌟 She’s amazing. 💖 She is an extraordinary woman with extraordinary love. @meiqinkb @rahrahkoh @hannah_joana__

This mother day, I give my Mom a big big Hug early morning when I see her. And the whole day she experience what the Queen is and do absolutely nothing. Including not even need go take water. Because she just need to say what she need will be fulfilled 🤗 
Mom is always there for me and I can count on her to help me with even the stupidest, littlest thing. 
No matter how many times I say I love you, I always love you more than that. I love you Mama!!! 💝💝💝 You are my SuperSHEroMom!!!
Grateful to my mum who took great care of my new born baby and me during this CB period. I know it's been tiring for her. Because is CB period can't have confinement lady at house. So my poor mum need to look after me and baby. without her we are nothing and helpless. This is greatest form of love! Is agape love! 
While Mum may not wear a costume and run around saving the world, she is my own personal inspiration! No matter how awful I was to her, she loved me unconditionally. All of her nagging and criticisms have helped me become a better person and prepare me for the world. 
Thank you, Mom, for being the BEST mother anyone could ever ask for and putting up with me and you deserved all the good things in life, including this lovely ✨ntuc voucher to reward yourself with anything you like. @zoey_belle_  @rahrahkoh  @shalomzozo

My love for @ruchikasehgaldang is expressed each and every day from the time we wake up until we are dreaming about our loving sweet memories created. It was the same love which was shared on this special day as a thankful note for her unconditional love, care and attention to our family all through the year. Best reward was to ensure that there is minimal amount of time spent in preparing for the family meals and more in enjoying the time together 🥰

I wrote a card for my mother, writing a card for special occasions like mothers' day has been a tradition in my family. My siblings and I also prepared a meal for my mum and baked heart shaped cookies for her 💓 This year's mothers' day is indeed a unique one, as my family would usually dine out to celebrate the occasion. This year, we had a simple homecooked meal instead. Despite this, it reminded us to never take such instances for granted and to be grateful for family time 😌😌

Since the start of circuit breaker, I have been researching and learning from online forums on how to make paper flowers using origami techniques ✌️ While it can be uncommon for a guy to pick up this skill, I was determined to make a bouquet of origami roses and eventually surprised my beloved mother with this handcrafted gift during Mother's Day 👏👏👏

Mother’s Day, this year is unique and a day with a heart touching memories. As a daughter to the Mother, walking in her foot steps that giving back to the community. I donated a little my amount to a family who lost the bread winner left behind with Wife and too kids. My mother shed tears and said that this is the ever best gift she has received. As a Mother to my Son, I was treated with a candle light dinner setting home  made authentic restaurant style dum Biryani perfection even though it is first try in the kitchen.  A great day of Live lively at the present moment. I am feeling blissful. 💕
@shopavision

This year due to Covid-19, Government imposed stay home and I feel very blessed and fortunate that I'm staying together with my mum and still get to celebrate Mother's Day with her as to some may not be able to celebrate together due to not staying together. Therefore I really treasure this celebration even more. This year other than personally whipping up all her favourite dishes, I give her a personal full body massage with relaxing oil that I have ordered online to pamper her and surprise her. ❤ My Mum have never been to any spa or massage places before so this is her first time experiencing body massage. I also order her a floral hamper with collagen drink in the hamper with a card that stated Mum I love you! She love flower in nature but I believe she love my massage and card message more hehe. 
My Mom is the
(B ) be there for me
(E ) everytime I need her
(S ) sacrifice a lot
(T ) to show her unconditional love for me
(M ) mentors me to be a better person
(O ) open her both arms and listening ear to me anytime
(M ) motivates me to achieve further
I'm very thankful and grateful to my mum for single-handedly raised the 2 of us by doing two jobs, do housework till past midnight & teaches us good morales. I know it been tough on her to act dual roles as a Mother & a Father. She is the pillar of strength and source of income for the whole family. She never once complained and stayed strong throughout because she just want to give us the best she could & seeing us grow up healthy & happily. 💓 Despite we were not rich, but I was never once felt lack. My mum will save every single bit of goodness to us and provides us with everything as much as she can. In my whole life, she is my motivation because she makes so many sacrifices to make sure I have everything I could possibly want and I'm happy. My mom has dedicated herself to me. I appreciate everything she's done for me. @hannah_joana__ @shalomzozo @meiqinkb

The whole family was at home so it was a bustling Mother’s Day. She has been very busy this circuit breaker as all of us are at home during this time. My sis baked a strawberry cake for my mum, her favourite and we prepared steamboat dinner at home. Family bonding time ❤️

We celebrated Mother's Day with cake, balloon, flowers and gifts!
My mom has superpowers...my mom has the power of eyes in the back of her head. Her famous lines: "Don't even think about it." "I see you." Only eyes in the back of her head could explain how she knew that it was me who broke her vase. 
My mom has the power to read minds. She would say: "It looks like you had a bad day, want to talk about it?" " I think you need some ice cream, let's just you and me go get some."
My mom has superpowers. She is an extraordinary woman with extraordinary love. She shared that love with me so that I, too, can be extraordinary.
The good news is now I'm a mom. And wouldn't you know it...I can feel them sprouting, even as we speak...eyes on the back of my head!
I love you my Mom, Ummi!!! 💝💝💝 fb: Ajeek Syasya. @_nsssknhhhh @waltzrocket @mustuckin

Luckily I still stay with my mom! Usually we have a fancy meal as a family, but because of this period, it’s so hard to order a cake (coz of slow fingers). The sibs whipped a honeycomb cake for mom and zi char meal! It was great learning how to cook with my sibs @buenos_bean

Luckily I still stay with my mom! Usually we have a fancy meal as a family, but because of this period, it’s so hard to order a cake (coz of slow fingers). The sibs whipped a honeycomb cake for mom and zi char meal! It was great learning how to cook with my sibs @_ankee

As my mum and i are staying in different homes, we could only video call her and show her the gift we got her for mothers' day. As for myself, we baked a cake and my husband bought a dinner treat for me.

Hi @shopavision 👋 for me everyday is mother's day... 10th May only a calender that we should mark that day we call "mother's day" 😊 so sad i can't celebrate it to my mother cause we are far (my mom in indonesia) we only video call.. so sad 😔 after cbp over i really want to visit her, want to having foods together, spending more time with her Thanks 🙏

☘️ Different this year - I always thought of baking something for my mum on a special day but was always flooded by a variety of alternatives outside home such as dinner out or buying a gift. This year, ironically, staying home allows me to consider home-special way of celebrating Mother’s Day! My mum and I went Fairprice (not many shops open) for shopping and we picked some flour and yeast. I bake a bread, yes not a cake, a sweet potato bread from a rice cooker. Something my mum used so often for cooking rice for us. And I used the same to bake her a dinner roll on a special day. 🍠🍞🌹🍷🥰 @shopavision

answers.text: @shopavision liked and shared on my story 😁

text: I ordered a feast and surprise her with flowers on Mother's Day

This Mother's day we spent time cleaning the house and in the kitchen baking and cooking ! ❤️ Dear Mum , thank you for your love and affection , you gave your time , energy , life to us . You Were there when we are down ,  You Were there when we were sick ,  You Were There To Teach Us ,  You Were There to guide us to the light ,  You Were There To Support The Family ,  You Were There To Tidy The house ,  You Were There To Cook For Us ,  You Were There To Keep Our Relationship Strong !  Thank you Mommy ! I LOVE YOU BACK AND FROM THE MOON ❤️❤️❤️

Making breakfast and called flower to deliver to our house and surprised her and she was so happy. And i did the household chores for a day becayse mother's day is a day for her to rest and thank her for all her efforts ! And we cooked Seafood Agio Aglio For lunch for the family and dinner we ate a buffet spread prepared by the whole family because my mom is a strong mom who works as a frontliner and i apprecuate what she is doing without her love and support we will not be her and i have the best mom who teaches our values and seeing her being so happy to see each of her child developing their own chatacter and personality and always cooking delicious food , I LOVE YOU MUM , YOU ARE THE BEST 💖💖 You are Marvellous , Optimistic , Trustful , Hardworking , Effortless Love , Readily Avaliable to always spent time with us !
I made her rest for the day and did all the housework and made breakfast and cooked lunch! Dinner was a surprise delivery from her favourite place ❤️
Making a simple handmade card and meal so that she can enjoy a good rest 💕
I made her breakfast and a homemade card! Also sprang a surprise in the afternoon with a homemade cake!

I celebrated mother's day by cooking a storm for my mum, 3 meals!  I plaanned activities like makeup and hairdo session, so that we can take loads of nice photos for the whole day.  We also switched on our near rusty voices and sing KTV for 5 hours!  It wasn't so bad celebrating at home after all.  @estherl.chng1983

Celebrated Mother's Day with my mother with a simple order-in dinner for the family! ❤️😊 During this circuit breaker period, I developed a greater appreciation for my mum's love and concern for us - cooking delicious meals everyday, making nourishing desserts or herbal tea to keep us nourished or preparing fruit plates to keep us healthy! Not just just on Mother's Day, I told her she is THE BEST randomly throughout this period 😂😂 I will be bringing my mum for a make-up meal once the circuit breaker is over. We are grateful and blessed that my family is safe and sound at home, together! 😊❤️ love you! @geokkimlow #mothersday #singapore #sgunited

We celebrate mother's day delivery a flower bouquet to her house, preorder favourite breakfast Kueh delivery to doorstep. 
And baked her a chiffon cake, order sumptuous Hao Lai Wu steamboat & BBQ  enjoy with family to pamper my mum.👍👍👍👸
You are my strength and guidance me 
along the path, and love, compassionate 
and bravery you teach me. 
Thank you and always grateful mum. ❤

I order online 1 box of collagen drink and delivery to my mom house, restore and replenish youthful sskin. More surprise waiting a flower bouquet delivery and Thai Zi char for dinner. Liked post +followed 💝 @jchin10 @hlgoh.sg @mandyalextrixie
Every year we celebrate at old age home, this year was different we stayed at home and baked a cake and went through all the old photos. A nice and quiet one indeed. @madhu.mehta.77985

We cooked Chilli 🦀 and had cake!
I also made a pair of clay earrings for my mom since it’s almost impossible to head out to get gifts nowadays.
It’s the simplest thoughts that counts 💞

My brother and me whipped up a feast for the family! We even baked a cake using online recipe 😂  We don’t need fancy cake or meal, simple ways like these is enough for us to rejuvenate and indulge in each other companionship. It’s not just the things we do that make memories, it’s the people I do them with ❤️ I love to sit down to have a meal together with my family. A relaxing meal that allows us to have meaningful conversations. Spending quality time with family is important and it goes a long way in boosting happiness. As I get older, the time i spend with my family seems to diminish. Don’t overlook this important area in life because nothing can replace the time spend with family ❤️ My mum is special because of her unconventional way of loving me. During my university days, when I am always studying late at night till 2-3am, she will “scold” me for studying till the wee hours. No matter is it primary school, secondary school, junior college or when choosing university courses, she always make sure she’s there to “nag” at me and “challenge” my choices. Now that I’m married, she’s still there to “complain” about the food i cook and how i manage household matters. 
But i know deep down in her heart, she love me for who I am. No matter what time it is or how busy she is, I can count on her to be there for me. I’m very fortunate that I can always turn to her and there was never a time where I felt that I'm alone. I'm grateful for her and I appreciate the role she play in my life ❤️ she show me her capacity of loving someone in a way I never would have imagined, she show me how big her heart would get, she show me that being a mum is the best job in the world and she wouldn't want it any other way ❤️ Liked and shared to story !!
(FB: Joanne Phang)

For this Mother's day i have order catering for her, giving her surprise liked singing, dancing and lots of kisses❤❤💋💋💋
Without my mother i will not come to this world and she means the whole world to me.
My loving mummy is my best friend, advisor and idol who has constantly manage 3 family for yrs as my cousin parents has passed on so look after them like her own. 
She has her own job as well but always cook for the whole household and whoever need help she will be there no matter how busy she is. Mother is always determine to complete everything by her own.
A charity heart that always help anyone throughout. She manage the family through hardship as lots of things happen around. Always shown so much care and concern for everyone. 
Without her i wont be here today. She has look after everyone in family well esp me. Without her i wont have so much will power to stay on as almost die due to lots of injuries. Always anything happen she will the first one to recuse me from death. My role model supermon always. Love her to max.
No words can describe what she has done for the family. No matter how life is she will never giveup.
❤❤❤❤❤❤❤
Magnanimous

Reliable
❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤
Really thankful for my mum who given me constant love & support at my lowest point when i almost die and my happinest moment.❤❤
Liked and shared to all. Fb Carol Neo

Making efforts to make my mom and mom in law favourite Castella cake and kueh balulu while they kids help to diy Mother’s Day cards for them and for me ! 
It’s a simple but yet meaningful and heart warming of celebration
